title: Golf Fundamentals
description: Golf is a club-and-ball sport played on a course with the objective of hitting balls into holes. Test your knowledge about majors, equipment, and golf terminology.

questions.question: How many major championships are there in professional golf?
What are the four major golf tournaments?
options: Masters, US Open, British Open, PGA Championship
Masters, US Open, French Open, PGA Championship
Masters, US Open, British Open, European Championship
Masters, US Open, British Open, World Championship
questions.correct_answer: Masters, US Open, British Open, PGA Championship

questions.question: What is the term for one stroke under par on a hole?
Which golfer has won the most major championships?
What is the standard number of clubs allowed in a golfer's bag?
What is the first shot on a hole called?
Which major tournament is played at Augusta National?
What is the term for completing a hole in two strokes under par?
What is the area of short grass surrounding the hole called?
Which golfer is known as 'The Golden Bear'?
